comments: Many like her, but I found her extremely annoying and heavy-handed. Her Criminal Law class also consisted of an astonishing amount of time-consuming "busy work." She taught the class at a very low level although the material certainly sets up well for a higher-brow approach.
Alot of work for a PR class. Journals, take home final + a 3 hour final exam on top of having to study and prepare for the MPRE.
